original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at Rs306.00/307.50 to US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee opened at 306/307.50 to the US dollar on Wednesday, while bond yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 22.80 percent, steady from yesterday’s close at 22.90/23.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 27.00/15 percent, steady from yesterday’s 27.05/15 percent. (Colombo/ June 21/2023)
